skillTree.localised_description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: "Warriors of the Hound arise, for today we bathe in the blood of our foes!"

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% for armies
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Burn! Burn it all to the ground! Sear the flesh from their bodies, for they are destined for the Throne of Skulls!"

effects.description:
Replenishes 20% campaign movement range after winning a battle
	(Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: Relentless, unfazed, unbroken – the headsman of the Hound will pursue the Blood God's enemies to the ends of the earth.
Khorne blesses his warriors for every enemy slain, feasting on their suffering and screams.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (300)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Quench the soil in blood; every drop is but murderous motivation!
No magic can deter one driven by the murderous force of fury.
Those who behold such rage incarnate would surely stare in awe, were their heads not promptly removed from their bodies.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each nearby entity death (200)

skillTree.localised_description: The Blood God scorns magic. Only blood split through physical combat is acceptable to Khorne.
Blood for the Blood God!

effects.description:
Enemy fire resistance: -3%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -6%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Onwards! To war, and victory!

effects.description:
Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The soldiers hear the songs of the bard and know their champion fights on.
You’ll never survive a battle with footwork like that. Here, watch me.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +1 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +2 when defending
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 when defending
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This is no time for rest and games; up, on your feet! We have work to do.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(own armies in region)

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 5%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit is branded with the Mark of Khorne, and is affected by Khorne Authority.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.
Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Stain the snow red! Fill the valleys with their dead! Hoist their skulls upon every mountain!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
